sectionDownloadGuide.title: Download the instruction guide

frequentDoubts.title: Help Center
frequentDoubts.description: Find helpful information to answer your questions
frequentDoubts.descriptionFrequentDoubts: We've put together this list to give you the answers you need.
frequentDoubts.response_one: If you need help logging in to our app, please get in touch with our technical support team via the WhatsApp channel, available 24/7 to provide support in Spanish, English, Italian, French, Portuguese, German, Japanese, Spanish, Italian, Portuguese, Portuguese, German, Japanese and Traditional Chinese.
frequentDoubts.question_two: What can I do in the Holafly Center?
frequentDoubts.response_two: You will be able to check the status of your eSIMs and top-up a new bundle.
frequentDoubts.question_three: Problems logging in with your Apple ID?

response_three.paragraph_1: If you can't log in to our app with your Apple ID, it could be for the following reasons:
response_three.paragraph_2: 1) Your email might be hidden in the Apple ID.
response_three.paragraph_4: A) In your phone's settings, tap into iCloud, click on the toolbar, then click Hide My Email.
response_three.paragraph_5: B) Scroll to the bottom of the list and select an address under `[number] inactive email addresses`.
response_three.paragraph_6: C) Click the option to reactivate an email address and follow the on-screen instructions.
response_three.paragraph_7: 2) Your Apple ID email is not registered at checkout.

frequentDoubts.question_four: How can I access the Holafly Center?
frequentDoubts.response_four: You can log in directly using your Google or Apple account, or use another account and validate it through email or WhatsApp. Please use the same email you entered when purchasing your eSIM.
frequentDoubts.question_five: Where can I buy an eSIM to access the Holafly Center?
frequentDoubts.response_five: You can buy it on our website holafly.com
frequentDoubts.question_six: How do I know if my mobile is compatible with eSIMs?

response_six.paragraph: Si deseas saber qué teléfonos móviles son compatibles con eSIMs, visita el siguiente enlace: https://esim.holafly.com/how-to/esim-phones/

frequentDoubts.question_seven: What type of phone number will I receive with my eSIM?

response_seven.paragraph_1: If your plan includes calls, you’ll receive an Austrian (+43) phone number to make and receive calls in Europe*.
response_seven.paragraph_2: *Some countries are excluded. Please check our Technical Specs. It's important to note that when communicating with individuals outside the area of your assigned number, it may be considered an international call, and charges may apply based on their service provider.

frequentDoubts.question_eight: Once purchased, how will I receive my eSIM?
frequentDoubts.response_eight: As soon as you make the purchase, you will receive by email and WhatsApp the instructions to install and activate your eSIM for international travel.
frequentDoubts.question_nine: Can I use my eSIM for calls?
frequentDoubts.response_nine:
You can use your eSIM for calls depending on your destination and type of plan. To know if your eSIM includes calls, check out the Technical Specs of your data plan, on Holafly’s website.
The Europe eSIM, for example, allows you to use mobile data and make calls. It includes an Austrian (+43) phone number to make calls for up to 60 mins and receive calls for up to 60 mins. 
Also, you can make calls and send messages using apps like WhatsApp with your data.
frequentDoubts.question_ten: Can I make international calls with an eSIM?
frequentDoubts.response_ten:
If your data plan includes calls, you will be able to receive calls from anywhere in the world, but you can only make calls to countries with coverage.
Countries with coverage include: Czech Republic, Germany, Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Denmark, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Estonia, Finland, France, Greece, Hungary, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Sweden. Remember to dial the country code of each country before making a call.
However, it's important to note that when communicating with phone numbers outside the area of your assigned number (+43 Austria), it may be considered an international call, and charges may apply based on the service provider.
frequentDoubts.question_eleven: How can I receive calls using my eSIM?

response_eleven.paragraph_1: If your plan includes calls, you will be able to receive calls from any country. To know if your plan includes SMS, check out the Technical Specs of your data plan, on Holafly’s website.
response_eleven.paragraph_2: It's important to note that when communicating with phone numbers outside the area of your assigned number (+43 Austria), it may be considered an international call, and charges may apply based on the service provider.

frequentDoubts.question_twelve: Can I add more data or days to my current eSIM?
frequentDoubts.response_twelve: Yes, you can! If you run out of days or data in your current plan, you can purchase a top-up for your current eSIM. This will save you the time and effort of buying a new eSIM. If you purchase a top-up, it will be automatically activated once your current plan runs out.
frequentDoubts.question_thriteen: Can I send and receive SMS with my Holafly eSIM?
frequentDoubts.response_thriteen: To know if your eSIM includes SMS, check out the Technical Specs of your data plan, on Holafly’s website.
frequentDoubts.question_fourteen: How do I set up the eSIM on my device?

response_fourteen.paragraph_1: Once you purchase your eSIM, we will send you an email with precise instructions on how to install and activate it.
response_fourteen.paragraph_2: There are two ways to install an eSIM: by scanning the QR code or by copying and pasting the manual installation codes to Settings → Cellular → Add eSIM. Make sure to install your eSIM before your trip, since you will need an Internet connection.
response_fourteen.paragraph_3: Once there, select your Holafly eSIM as your preferred option for data roaming (and calls, if included) and turn on your data roaming.
response_fourteen.paragraph_4: For detailed information on the installation and activation process, check out our Guides.
response_fourteen.paragraph_5: If you have any questions or need help, don't hesitate to contact our Customer Support team. We will be there for you 24/7.
response_fourteen.paragraph_6: At Holafly, we want to make setting up your eSIM as easy as possible. For this reason, all our eSIM products come with complete instructions for easy setup.
response_fourteen.paragraph_7: If you have any questions or need help, don't hesitate to contact our customer support team. We will be there for you 24/7.

frequentDoubts.question_fifteen: Do I have to activate data roaming and voice calls on my device?

response_fifteen.paragraph_1: Yes, to get the best coverage with your Holafly eSIM, you must activate data roaming in your device settings. Don't worry; this will not generate additional charges from your operator if you have successfully configured your Holafly eSIM.
response_fifteen.paragraph_2: Also, make sure that your Holafly line is selected as your default voice line so that you can make calls without any problems. You can set this up in your phone's voice or call settings.

frequentDoubts.question_sixteen: Can I use my (physical) SIM card and Holafly eSIM at the same time?

response_sixteen.paragraph_1: Sure! You can keep your physical SIM card with your Holafly eSIM simultaneously on your device. Just make sure you choose your eSIM as your default voice line and preferred option for mobile data in your device settings.
response_sixteen.paragraph_2: Please note that if you leave your physical SIM card activated, you might get extra roaming fees from your network provider.

frequentDoubts.question_seventeen: How many minutes do I have to make and receive calls?

response_seventeen.paragraph_1: Holafly’s data plans with calls usually include 60 minutes to make calls and 60 minutes to receive them. Remember that these are independent; in other words, you have a total of 120 minutes to enjoy during your trip.
response_seventeen.paragraph_2: If you need more minutes, you can purchase a top-up through our Holafly Center or Holafly App.

footer.howToSetupYourEsim: How to set up your eSIM
footer.madeWithLove: Made with <heart/> by people who loves to travel. Holafly 2024 ®

instructions.activateWhenYouArrive: Activate the eSIM when you arrive

addESIMMobileDataPlan.1: Go to settings > Cellular > Add Cellular plan
addESIMMobileDataPlan.title: Add eSIM mobile data plan

addTo.1: Select your 'Primary' plan to continue using your number for iMessage, FaceTime and Apple ID, and tap on 'Continue'.
addTo.title: Add to iMessage, FaceTime and Apple ID

forSomeESIMs.1: Check your eSIM installation details on holafly.com to verify this.
forSomeESIMs.2: Once you know if it needs to be turned on, go to Settings > Cellular > Mobile Data again > Choose your eSIM.
forSomeESIMs.title: For some eSIMs to work, data roaming needs to be turned on.

ifYouNeedToEditSettings.1: Changing your APN allows you to access cellular data.
ifYouNeedToEditSettings.2: Go to Holafly.com > My eSIMs > choose the eSIM you are installing > Click on any installation option to see the APN details.
ifYouNeedToEditSettings.title: Check if you need to edit your eSIM's APN settings

importantNotes.1: To install an eSIM, ensure that you have an eSIM compatible and network-unlocked device.
importantNotes.2: For successful installation, you MUST have a stable Wi-Fi connection when activating an eSIM.
importantNotes.3: Installing your eSIM before you travel will not affect its data usage and validity; with exceptions (see list at the end). Your eSIM will only be activated upon arrival at your destination, and the validity begins once you are connected to the local carrier. If the eSIM covers more than one country, it will activate at any of the covered countries (eSIMs that activate at the time of installation: Ubigi and Dtac)
importantNotes.title: Important notes:

installESIMViaQR.1: Scan the QR code or manually input your eSIM details.
installESIMViaQR.2:
You can find your eSIM details on:
Holafly.com > My eSIMs > Choose eSIM you want to install > choose your installation option
installESIMViaQR.title: Install eSIM via QR code or Manual Installation

installationIsDone.1: You can turn off your eSIM for now. Turn it back on when you're about to hop on your flight or when you land. See additional instructions below. Your eSIM will be activated as soon as your phone is connected to your destination's network.
installationIsDone.title: <icon /> Installation is done

labelYourESIM.1: After your eSIM has been added, you can choose label it to help you identify it (Holafly - Destination)
labelYourESIM.title: Label your eSIM

optionOne.1: Go to My eSIMs to find your QR code via the app or the website
optionOne.2: Go to Settings on your device
optionOne.4: Tap the Add icon next to Mobile Network
optionOne.5: Tap Next when asked “Don't have a SIM card?
optionOne.6: You can now scan your QR code
optionOne.7: If necessary, go to Network & Internet and tap on Mobile network to set the correct network preferences listed in the Additional Info which is at the bottom-right of the selected data package page.
optionOne.8: Turn on eSIM under Mobile Network
optionOne.10: Enable Data Roaming (Please turn off your primary line to avoid roaming charges from your carrier provider when overseas)
optionOne.11: Set up an APN(access point name) on your device if required. If the APN settings are required for your eSIM, you can find the APN details in the eSIM installation details
optionOne.subTitle: To scan the QR Code and set up your eSIM, please follow these steps:
optionOne.title: Option 1 - By scanning the eSIM QR Code

optionTwo.1: Go to My eSIMs to find your Manual Installation details via the app or the website
optionTwo.2: Go to Settings on your device
optionTwo.4: Tap the Add icon next to Mobile Network
optionTwo.5: Tap Next when asked “Don't have a SIM card?
optionTwo.6: Tab Enter Code Manually. You will be asked to enter:
optionTwo.10: Turn on your eSIM under Mobile Network
optionTwo.12: Enable Data Roaming (Please turn off your primary line to avoid roaming charges from your carrier provider when overseas)
optionTwo.13: Set up an APN(access point name) on your device if required. If the APN settings are required for your eSIM, you can find the APN details in the eSIM installation details
optionTwo.subTitle: If you are experiencing issues scanning the QR code or are unable to scan the QR code, you can enter eSIM details manually. Please follow these steps:
optionTwo.title: Option 2 - By adding the eSIM manually

setMobileDataDefaultLine.1: Choose your eSIM data plan here as we'll need this turned on to ensure we are able to check the APN settings in the next step.
setMobileDataDefaultLine.2: Important: Turn off “Allow Mobile Data Switching” to avoid high roaming bills on your primary data plan.
setMobileDataDefaultLine.title: Set Your Default Line for Mobile Data

setPrimaryDefaultLine.1: Set your 'Primary' plan as the default line to continue using your number for calling and sending messages to people who are not in your contacts, and tap on 'Continue'.
setPrimaryDefaultLine.title: Set Your Primary Default Line

instructions.theFollowingGuide: <icon /> The following guide can vary depending on the Android device
instructions.thereAreTwoWays: There are 2 ways to add an eSIM to your device(please note these steps may differ depending on your device):
instructions.title: Installation instructions

turnOnYourESIM.1: Go to Settings > Cellular > choose eSIM > Turn On This Line
turnOnYourESIM.2: Make sure your use your eSIM as the Primary line when travelling.
turnOnYourESIM.3: Go to Settings > Cellular > Primary > Choose active eSIM.
turnOnYourESIM.4: Important Note: Please turn off data roaming on your primary plan to avoid unnecessary roaming charges.
turnOnYourESIM.title: Turn on your eSIM

updateYourApnSettings.1: Go to Settings > Mobile Data > choose your eSIM plan > Mobile Data Network. Change it to your eSIM's APN settings. Other APN fields are optional.
updateYourApnSettings.title: Update your APN settings, if needed

sectionInstructions.title: What you need to do? Follow these steps to configure your eSIM.
sectionInstructions.descriptionInstructions: You can install it by scanning the QR code that you received in your email at the time of purchase, or you can use the installation codes that you find below and follow the steps that appear in the instructions section.

activationCode.title: Scan the QR code to install your eSIM

sectionActivateDestination.title: 2. Activate at your destination
sectionActivateDestination.description: If you activate before, the consumption of your data will begin and Holafly will not be responsible.

tooltips.two: Here you can see the data packages that you bought to continue having internet on your eSIM.

first.title: Purchase info
first.description: In the event of contacting support, please provide this information if requested

Installation.title: Installation
Installation.description: A correct installation will be performed when you scan the QR code or enter the manual installation codes in the cell phone settings, and you complete the steps of the instructions.

Activation.title: Activation
Activation.description: Keep data roaming turned off, so it doesn’t activate before you reach your destination. Activation will be effective when you turn on data roaming in your cell phone settings.

TopUp.title: Top Up
TopUp.description: It will only be possible to top up when the eSIM is active and will be added the day after the day the first plan you purchased expires.

PlanExpiration.title: Plan expiration
PlanExpiration.description: Once you activate data roaming, the days of your plan will begin to count down. We recommend that you only activate the eSIM at your destination.

Refunds.title: Refunds
Refunds.description: You have a period of thirty (30) days after the purchase to apply for a refund. The response time for these requests can last from three (3) to five (5) days.

Hotspot.title: Hotspot
Hotspot.description: The availability of data sharing may vary depending on the destination and the type of plan you purchased.

InternationalDataPolicy.title: International data policy
InternationalDataPolicy.description: The speed and daily data consumption is subject to the international data policy outside Holafly.

list.1: - High speed and stable connection in the Democratic Republic of Congo.
list.2: - Receive your QR code and surf the web instantly.
list.3: - Easy to set up and activate.
list.4: - Keep your WhatsApp number on your cellphone.
list.5: - Connect to the best network in the Democratic Republic of Congo.
list.6: - Forget about roaming or searching for public WiFi networks.

list.1: Connect to the Internet in the Democratic Republic of Congo with a prepaid eSIM with data. Keep in touch with your family and friends through your favorite apps like WhatsApp, iMessage, or Skype. Forget about roaming and start saving on your trip.
list.2: It’s easy to activate and use. After your purchase, we will send you a QR code to your email. Scan it to install the eSIM for the Democratic Republic of Congo and start using the service. No paperwork or waiting.

list.10: - Analog calls: No, only through apps (VOIP)
list.11: - Activation: Automatic, activated when connected to a cellular network.
list.12: - Compatibility: all smartphones with eSIM technology enabled. Operation on smartwatches and tablets is not guaranteed.
list.18: - Coverage: You will enjoy good coverage in Kinshasa, Lubumbashi, Kananga, and other cities and tourist destinations in the Democratic Republic of Congo.
list.19: - Designed for: tourism, backpackers, vacations, digital nomads, and business.

list_3.paragraph_1: Redeem your HolaCoins for a discount on your next eSIM purchase.

list_4.paragraph_1: Collecting enough HolaCoins allows you to redeem the full value of 1 eSIM!
